presentation.p:
Hi, I'm Alexandre.

With a passion for Web development for more than four years, I wish to put my skills and knowledge at the service of your projects. I’m specialized in the development of websites and Web applications.

Having a solid background in back-end, front-end and marketing, I offer complete and fully customized solutions according to your requirements. I help you choose the most suited digital support for your company (showcase website, e-commerce, blog, ...) and put in place good practices to improve your visibility on the net and your digital identity.

backend.description: I use different Back-end (server side) technologies in order to maximise the performance and security of your website.

item1.label: Security
item1.description: I use strong programming languages and set up good security practices on your website.

item2.label: Reliability
item2.description: I ensure that the different functionalities of your website are reliable in the long run by testing them in different use cases.

item3.label: Data organization
item3.description: I use relational database management systems (MySQL, PostreSQL) in order to store and structure the data of your website.

item4.label: Speed
item4.description: I try to shorten the loading times to a minimum and speed up the execution of the various tasks of your website.

frontend.description: I use the latest Front-end (client side) technologies in order to enhance the user experience and refine the interface of your website.

item1.label: Responsive design
item1.description: I ensure that your website is adapted to the modern numerical supports (Computers, tablets, mobile phones, …).

item2.label: User experience
item2.description: I pay particular attention to user experience by maximizing ergonomics, ease of use and visual appearance of your website.

marketing.description: I attach great importance to the marketing aspect of your website in order to improve your image and your visibility on the net.

item1.label: Search Engine Optimization
item1.description: I put in place good SEO (Search Engine Optimization) practices in order to improve the position of your website in the results of different search engines.

item2.label: Web analytics
item2.description: By setting up Google Analytics on your website, I give you access to a tool that provides you with complete reports about the traffic on your website.

item1.label: aero
item1.longDescription:
AERO is a marketing campaign management software used by SEPHORA DIGITAL SEA (South-East Asia).

AERO was first designed to streamline the process of creating marketing campaigns by
  • Standardizing the vocabulary used
  • Helping the different stakeholders to share information
  • Archiving all the created campaigns

In addition, by collecting different "meta-data" around these campaigns, AERO provides important feedbacks of their effectiveness (ROI, most efficient channels, etc.). In the long term, it can become a real tool to assist in the creation of marketing campaigns.

item2.label: SEPHORA
item2.longDescription:
Autonomous program communicating with a user in order to help him choose a good Christmas gift

The bot asks a series of questions to the user in order to better know the receiver of the gift and to offer personalized recommendations based on the best-sellers of SEPHORA products

The user communicates naturally with the bot, as if it communicated with a human being. The bot uses different "Natural Language Processing" algorithms in order to interpret the user's messages and extract useful information.

item3.label: ccookie
item3.longDescription:
Interface able to analyze different characteristics of the human voice (intonation, speech rate, listening rate, etc.)

The application is used as a digital support during training sessions and improves the commercial skills of the participants.

item4.label: sephora data
item4.shortDescription: blog about the latest work of sephora data team
item4.longDescription:
Blog used internally by the company SEPHORA DIGITAL SEA (South-East Asia) containing the latest work of the DATA team.

The blog is a way to effectively share information between different teams within the company and to archive this information.
